                    boolean... addToBeginning)
        Adds a single line to the Item lore
        Parameters:
        lore - Line to be added
        addToBeginning - Nullable true if lore should be added to the beginning

      • removeLore

        public void removeLore(java.lang.String lore)
        Removes a specified line from the lore. If the lore has no lines after this, it will be removed completely
        Parameters:
        lore - - Line to be removed

      • removeLore

        public void setSlot(int slot)
        Changes the item slot. Item in old slot will be removed
        Parameters:
        slot - slot the item will be put in
